titleInfo.title: R U N A W A Y.

mods.abstract: R U N A W A Y . $40, Reward or $10 apiece will be given to whomsoever will apprehend and bring back to the undersigned the slaves Rosemond, Francois Hilaire and Hypolite. creole negroes and well known on the Island of False River where they have often been seen. J. F. LAPICE. Island Plantation, Sept. 18. 1858. 4w

detail.title: Pointe Coupee Democrat. : (False River [i.e. New Roads], Parish of Pointe Coupee [La.]) 1858-1862

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
